trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around July 28th 2012
Summary: 3 UFO sightings at the same time. 1 craft shot something looked like a very WEIRD Flare
divs: Sighting DetailsI went to my backyard to feed my dogs. I then looked at the skies. Staring at the clear dark skies i noticed a pulsating stationary object with dfferent colors pulsating. it wasnt a plane or a star. then it just dissappeared until i saw another object with an angle of 80 degrees moving really slow with a faint light, as it was traveling west towards the ocean, it shot some kind of projectile that looked like a flare. I KNOW IT WASNT A FLARE. 1)when it was first shot it looked like sparks propelled at great speeds.2)It maintained velocity.3)the projectiled behaved like gravity nor Air gave it any resistance for the maneuvers it displayed. after the craft shot the "projectile" the craft easily travelled more than 1000mph in a blink of an eye.
